price: Silaa nijedhan “ijootuma keenyatu cufame, Inumaa nuti ummata sihriin itti godhameedha”.
arabic: لَقَالُوٓاْ إِنَّمَا سُكِّرَتۡ أَبۡصَٰرُنَا بَلۡ نَحۡنُ قَوۡمٞ مَّسۡحُورُونَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: laqālū innamā sukkirat abṣārunā bal naḥnu qawmun masḥūrūna
